title: Friends in the Stars
description: In Friends in the Stars, a mother dog and her pup play a game with the stars while sitting in the backyard. Students will enjoy connecting the dots (stars) on each page to reveal the different pictures Momma and Puppy are seeing in the stars. Along with creative illustrations, early readers are supported by high-frequency words and a repeated phrase throughout the story.
meta: breathing, hunting, looking, slithering, stars, waving
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Reality and Fantasy : Categorize parts of the story into reality and fantasy
Blend Phonemes : Demonstrate how to blend phonemes
Blends : Name words that contain the s-blends
Interrogative Sentences : Identify and create interrogative sentences
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
